queries.query: SELECT USER_ID ,USER_NM ,LANG_CD ,EN_FIRST_NM ,EN_LAST_NM ,EMAIL ,DEPT_CD ,DEPT_NM ,TITLE_CD ,TITLE ,DUTY_CD ,DUTY_NM ,COMPANY_CD ,COMPANY_NM ,COM_CD ,COM_PART ,OFFICE_PHONE_NO ,MOBILE_NO ,JOB_GROUP_CD ,EMPLOYEE_NO ,UPDATE_STATE ,MAIN_JOB ,BIRTHDAY ,DEFAULT_BG_CD ,LOCK_YN ,INTERFACE_YN ,CHINESE_NM ,CREATION_USER_ID ,CREATION_DATE ,LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID ,LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,SUBCONTRACTOR_OID ,USE_YN ,EXTRNL_USER_PSWD ,BIRTHDAY_SL FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #EMP_NO#

select top 20 A.MODEL_ID AS ID, A.MODEL_NM AS NAME, A.PROJECT_NO AS PRJ, B.PLAN_STEP AS PHASE, B.PLAN_SERIAL AS SERIAL from TB_RGT_MODEL_MST A, TB_RGT_PLAN B where A.MODEL_ID = B.MODEL_ID order by A.CREATION_DATE desc;

select A.MODEL_ID AS ID, A.MODEL_NM AS NAME, A.PROJECT_NO AS PRJ, B.PLAN_STEP AS PHASE, B.PLAN_SERIAL AS SERIAL from TB_RGT_MODEL_MST A, TB_RGT_PLAN B where A.MODEL_ID = B.MODEL_ID order by A.CREATION_DATE desc;
insert into TB_RGT_MOBILE_FAILURE ( model_id, image_id, failure, create_date ) values ( #MODEL#, (select max(id) from TB_RGT_MOBILE_IMAGE where originalFileName like #IMAGE#), #FAILURE#, #DATE# )

select C.ID ,C.FAILURE ,C.CREATE_DATE ,A.MODEL_ID AS MODEL_ID ,A.MODEL_NM AS NAME ,A.PROJECT_NO AS PRJ ,B.PLAN_STEP AS PHASE ,B.PLAN_SERIAL AS SERIAL ,D.ORIGINALFILENAME ,D.SAVEDFILENAME ,D.SAVEDPATH from TB_RGT_MODEL_MST A, TB_RGT_PLAN B, TB_RGT_MOBILE_FAILURE C, TB_RGT_MOBILE_IMAGE D where C.MODEL_ID = A.MODEL_ID and A.MODEL_ID = B.MODEL_ID and C.IMAGE_ID = D.ID order by CREATE_DATE desc

select C.ID ,C.FAILURE ,C.CREATE_DATE ,A.MODEL_ID AS MODEL_ID ,A.MODEL_NM AS NAME ,A.PROJECT_NO AS PRJ ,B.PLAN_STEP AS PHASE ,B.PLAN_SERIAL AS SERIAL ,D.ORIGINALFILENAME ,D.SAVEDFILENAME ,D.SAVEDPATH from TB_RGT_MODEL_MST A, TB_RGT_PLAN B, TB_RGT_MOBILE_FAILURE C, TB_RGT_MOBILE_IMAGE D where C.MODEL_ID = A.MODEL_ID and A.MODEL_ID = B.MODEL_ID and C.IMAGE_ID = D.ID and C.ID = #ID#

SELECT [id] ,[model_id] ,[image_id] ,[failure] ,[create_date] FROM [dbo].[TB_RGT_MOBILE_FAILURE]
SELECT [id] ,[originalFileName] ,[savedFileName] ,[savedPath] ,[create_date] FROM [dbo].[TB_RGT_MOBILE_IMAGE]
SELECT [id] ,[code] ,[name] ,[phase] ,[serial] FROM [dbo].[TB_RGT_MOBILE_MOBILE]
SELECT [id] ,[code] ,[name] ,[phase] ,[serial] FROM [dbo].[TB_RGT_MOBILE_MODEL]
